title: Expendables 4, The Post, and Akira - The Kinda Funny Morning 01.15.18
description:
Happy MLK day! Tim joins Nick to talk about Expendables 4, Live Die Repeat 2, The Post, and the 1988 classic, Akira.

-Saudi Arabia begins screening films after decades-long ban lifted (10:05 mins)
-Sylvester Stallone teases The Expendables 4 (16:06 mins)
-Doug Liman says Edge of Tomorrow 2 could be his next film (25:02 mins)
-Edge of Tomorrow sequel called "live die repeat and repeat" (30:00 mins)
-Deep dive: what we did the guys did this weekend (31:25 mins)

Thanks to twitter.com/kumailh for our timestamps!

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.
